page.title: 14THE BROMYARD HEALTH SERVICE
page.content: Bromyard needs a hospital due to the many old people who live in Bromyard. Bromyard has a{doctors' surgery with a group practice of four doctors and some district nurses. They treat all illnesses except for emergencies. Due to the distance from Hereford hospitals, the practice needs a comprehensive range of medical supplies. The main{dental practice,}situated in the High Street, has two working dentists. This practice has been open for over 50 years. People come to the dentist from a 7-mile radius. During the past two years the number of patients has declined due to the opening of another dental practice. Bromyard has two{opticians.}For emergency treatment people go to the Eye Hospital in Hereford.
